lexUnit.name: ear.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the organ of hearing and balance in humans and other vertebrates, especially the external part of this.

sentence.text: She rams a power drill into the ear of her baby doll while going through appalling ` cute " histrionics that are like Kate Bush with a soiled nappy and a gallon of helium .
He shouted in the ear of the man next to him who shouted back but all one could hear was ` Jesus " and the other ` Fucking gun " .
Blondel scowled , and then grabbed the headgear from the Lombard brothers and rammed it down over the ears of the prisoners .

Each ear of each child was investigated separately , thus enabling the comparison of four different types of ear : unoperated , ventilation tube alone , adenoidectomy alone , and adenoidectomy in combination with a tube .
Lee took them from her and kissed her and whispered in her ear : ` Be nice to Conrad , " because she knew Philippa considered him decadent and damned .
His breath was grunting in her ear as he stooped to find the edge of the tape , and she could smell the sweat and youth of his body as he worked .
On the way down the corridor Martinho hissed in my ear , ` You want to get us all shot ?
Shrugging the collar higher around tingling ears he thought of Carrie .
Nick was some way along the line , at the bend where the track curved round the mountain and Carrie saw him put his hands over his ears as the train blew its whistle .
The hall light was still on and he put his ear to the letter box ; he could hear her voice on the telephone but could not distinguish her words .
As publisher and chief executive of the New York Times , he is bashed about the ears by almost everybody he meets .
David was once cuffed around the ear for reciting The Spam Sketch during a school geography lesson .
He had lifted the phone and put it to his ear without ever coming properly awake .
Maura 's voice sounded shocked even to her own ears .
“ You know I do n't … but a few soft curls over each ear look very becoming — everyone says so . ”
` Keep your voice down , ca n't you ? " he murmured , but his two sons had sharp ears .
He had such beautiful furry ears .
Watt , however , has had some minor surgery on his ears in an effort to improve his balance and last night said he was feeling much better .
